content.detailedDescription: My grandfather, father, and i were returning from round rock, tx., early sundaymorning.  my grandfather was driving his studebaker, my father was in thepassenger seat, and i was in the back laying down.Suddenly my grandfather slowed and exclaimed, what in the hell is that.  i satup, and observed two shiny disk shaped objects, hovering above the road in frontof us, approx 100 yd.My grandfather came to a complete stop, and we watched as they hovered for abouta minute, or so, then slowly proceeded to the left, west, skimming over the topsof a crop, i believe maize, but not positive.  the tops of the crop werent beingdeflected, and the two objects were just inches above them.The objects proceeded to the end of the field, approx 300 yd, then flipped to averticle,and were clearly round, then shot straight up and out of sight within3-5 seconds.  there was no sound.

traveling west on i-10,entering houston,tx,10-16-02 approx. 1215pm. just as i was crossing the san jacinto river, i was drawn to a reflection in the sky and some distance away. i first assumed that it was the underbelly reflection of a high altitude commercial jet leaving or coming into bush intercontinental airport. no sooner than that thought entered my head, that the reflection seemed to disappear as though an invisible vaccum cleaner sucked it away toward the west. i looked for the jet thinking it had just turned away from the sunsreflection, but there was nothing in the sky period, not even a cloudin that portion of the sky. i do not know if anyone else saw this or not traffic was light and i did not stop, but i did slow down trying to see a jet in the sky around where that bright reflection had been. i am still trying to decide if i really saw what i saw or making something out of nothing. i thought by reporting to you, you could tell me if anyone else has reported any ufo activity around houston lately i would really appreciate some kind of reply please.

We saw something coming from over this big building behind our house. me and mybrother were about to go to sleep and i was leting the dog in. then the shiplanded then something jumped out and ran in to these woods behind our house.Thenwe locked all of thew doors and ran im to one of our rooms together.Thething hovered there for 1 minut then flew away. without the thing that jumpedout.The next morning we went to look for the creature ,but we didnt findanything.Now we dont go outside at night for anything.

content.detailedDescription: I first dismissed the light at 730pm as the same lights that i always observedin the sky for the last 4 years over martin, but this time the light has notmoved at all except for a few minor course adjustments i would surmise.  inoticed it out of the corner of my eye, because it was flashing.  i thought itwas a plane travelling away from my exact position in relation to the stars, butother planes have past by it in relation to me on the ground and it persist toremain in the exact area.  i am excited and want someone to explain exactly whatit is.  man-made gravitational distortion debris burning etci have not lost sight and it will be back tomorrow night in the same place.This is low atmoshperic anomaly or object that remains in the same point in thesky in relation to the moon,stars and aircraft. it pulsates and flashes andemits beams of light and pieces of it shoot off the top of it.  i observed thisphenomenom for 2 hours and it is 918pm and it is still in the same place.And i have gotten visual confirmations from countless other witnesses in thelocal business area on university avenue from papa johns, java central cafe, andcustomers.Tomas b. woodyno1stunna@themail.Com
content.summary: A flashing light emitting anomaly over the sky of

content.detailedDescription: While camping at bottomless lakes state park outside of roswell, nm, mygirlfriend and i heard a strange, high-pitched, oscillating sound coming fromthe west. we heard the sound for about 30 seconds and got up from our campsiteout from under some trees to investigate. the sound was making area coyotesdogshowl like crazy. the object had a red light on one side and a green light on theother, and white lights on the front and back. the red and green lights wereabout a third of the way between the white lights-- if you connected the lights,it would look like a kite. so basically, not terribly unlike a small prop planeif it had lights at its extremities, but it sounded nothing like one.  the red green lights were flashing and the white ones at he front and back stayed litconstantly.It was traveling relatively slow and low and went directly over us. as it did,due to the doppler effect, the sound became lower and the oscillations slower.We followed it until it disappeared into the horizon.  we couldnt actually seethe object, only the lights, so we have no idea about the actual shape, color orsize.We suspected it might be a b-2, but saw one the flying the next day outside ofalamogordo and it did not sound the same at all. based on subsequent internetresearch, were pretty sure it wasnt one. actually, when we logged onto thispage, the sound of opening pop up window is very simnilar.  it sounded somewhatjet-like, but it oscilated unlike any jet i have ever heard.We reported this on the nuforc site when we got back from our trip, but haventgotten any kind of response, so i thought i would report it here as well.  somefeedback would be much appreciated, even if it is just to tell us it was someplane we are unfamiliar with.Thanks in advance.

content.detailedDescription: On w.Broad street, i parked at a shopping center with the car pointed roughlyeast and while talking on a cell phone, noticed an object at least 30,000 insky.  having a private pilots license, and noticing the fairly heavy sprayingthat afternoon, i watched to see what kind of plane it was.Between 1755 and 1810 eastern, the roughly square-shaped object remained nearlystationary.For the first few minutes i thought it could have been traveling nw, but itremained in the same relative location.At about 1810 when i last looked toward the object, it was gone.

Our local fox news station videographer spotted object above jet taking offbroke off andfilmed objet moving at terrific speed some height over jet inperfect straight line no entrail silent.Shape off siver reflecting toothpickwith identical small wings stabilizarsat each end.This opening newsreportfollowed baseball game video is remarkably clear 1115 oct.20 fox news ch.8impossible to dtermine size and distance of object.Fox news has tape albany.Anemployee at airport verbally on film verfied that f.B.I.Called in toinvestigate.Feel free to cntact me.Fox wxxaph.518_862 2323 or 464 0143

content.detailedDescription: While observing shooting stars in the north western sky in the early a.M., wenoticed a planet like object, that was very bright and pulsing. the reason wenoticed the object was that we had been staring at that part of the sky and theobject just faded into our field of view.Our initial reaction was shock theobject came into view, stayed in one spot for about 2-3 minutes, then startedheading twords our position. as the object got closer we were able to determine that as opposed to being one large pulsing light, the object seemed to have a triangular shape to it with 3 smaller lights in the triangle corners and one large clearly pulsing light in the center. the center light seemed to be suspended inside the object.The center light pulsed from red-orange-violet-blue-green- and yellow.The center light seemed to be really fluid, where as the 3 outside lights hadthe same rainbow colors, but were less fluid looking they seemed to be timed.The object made no sound. it was the silence of the object that caused the mostdiscomfort for myself and the 2nd witness. we couldnt believe something that bigcould be completly silent.The object appeared looking like an artificially bright planet or star from thenorth west. it approched, passed over our position and headed south east. theobject stopped in the approximate location of eglin afb. the object decendedslowly, as it decended, the object became obscured by trees in our line of view.This craft is almost impossible to see in the night sky unless it moves.I can recall many occasions seeing similer bright artifical planet like objectsin the skythe combination of timed and pulsing colored lights seems to fool yourvisual senses, but since they stayed stationary, i would not pay as muchattention to them. with this sighting, we got the opportunity to see the craftmove and manuver.
content.summary: Triangle with lights that looked like a planet fro
Saw huge triangle hovering over downtown galion, o

content.detailedDescription: Monday october 14th at 815 pm we were camping in gaysville vermont, next tobethel vermont. we were inside our trailer eating supper. jarrod finished firstand went outside for a smoke. we have been camping in the same place for 10years. he suddenly noticed a stationary object in the ne sky at an altitude ofless than 2,000 feet, in an area of the sky that has no other objects in it. mywife ann went out and saw the same object. i was then called outside to lookalso. i saw an object in the distance that was stationary. at first it lookedlike a star, then i could see that the object was flashing. we had a pair ofbinoculars in the car and went and got them. ann looked first and said, what inthe world is that, jarrod looked at the object and said i have never seenanything like this before. i looked at the object and was amaised at what i saw.It appeared to be cone shaped and had extremely bright strobe like flashinglights. the colors werered, white, green, blue, and yellow. they were flashing quickly and seemed to bein a pattern. the object stayed in the same location for about one hour. shortlythere after it moved slightly south and stayed in that location for about 12hour. it vanished after that. we were all stunned by the sighting, and havenever seen anything like that in the sky.

We were driving to school around 630 in the morning and the radio got reallystaticy, so we turned the cd player on and it wasnt working.  georgette lookedup at the sky and noticed a blue light, she thought it was just a plane until wenoticed the diamond shape.  its lights were flickering and we all got a wierdfeeling and then we pulled the car over to get a better look.  we were parkednext to a farm and we noticed the cows were running around.  we looked back upand the blue white light was flickering and then it flew back and forth a whilethen it flew away.

I was on my front porch.I was looking to the east when the object appeared fromthe n.W. over my neighbors house.It traveled to the s.E. and out of view behinda large tree where i lost sight of it.I called my son who was inside and toldhim about it. my reaction was kind of like shock.You know like,what the hell wasthat.The object moved in a straight line at app.200 mph.I am a u.S.Navyvet.Having been a helicopter mech.I live in the flight path of ft.Lauderdaleexecutive airport,and am familiar with all the civilian aircraft that go in andout there.In daylight and at night i am familiar with these planes.Also thereare not many foreign,and no u.S.Military aircraft that i cant identify.Thisobject had no sound at all.I am just puzzled as to what it might havebeen.Thanks for your time.Sincerly,dennis underwood

early morning of september 4, 2002.  i found myself sitting on the sofa in theliving room.  i have no memory of waking up or falling asleep on the sofa.  whati did remember whats coming in to the house after seeing a huge object in thesky over a grassy area behind my house - facing south. it is in an area withgrass, tall trees and a wall blocking us off from another subdivision.  i know iwas sitting on the grass watching the object above me in the sky.  i remember abeam coming down over me.  after i was back in the house where i took out a penand drew a picture of what i saw.  i dont know how much time was missing andonly have a bit of memory from this episode.  i was in an enormous room with oneother being.  i also knew there were many many other people inside the objectbut they were in some other area.  i kept asking the being with me when i couldgo home.  his reply was, "you will go now".  i asked about the others in thecraft" and he said "it will be a long time before they will go home". "they arehere to help". the next thing i knew, i was back home.

content.summary: Saw light move in unnatural ways

content.detailedDescription: I had just parked my car in front of our house and was headed toward the stepsleading to the house when i glanced up and saw this spectacular display in themisty fog to the south east in the twilight. it looked like a comet with a hugeumbrella tail that looked like a jelly fish, luminous etc. it made no sound butslowly traced through the sky for about 20 seconds. right when i started torealize what a beautiful and amazing sight it was, the ball disappeared in puffof smoke and trail slowly dissipated with some whisps floating over my house ahundred feet or so up. it was the prettiest thing ive ever seen. im guessing itmay be a fireball but im hoping it was a craft of some sort.

Returning to lafayette, in from deer hunting at salamonie on us 24 w i witnessedsome strange lights.  after wabash but before peru a large amber light appearedin front of my vehicle maybe at 30 degree angle in wsw sky.   shortly afterseeing it oddly it blinked off.  a few minutes later i saw a series of eitherlights of the same object or 4 different hovering objects blinking in sequence. the lights were kinda gourd shapedchanging in brightness.  the lights weremostly white had other colors including green and amber toward the edges.  afterblinking in succession as if heading south came a blink further northnotaerodynamically possible.  each blink was similar colorbrightness and duration. no other lights were scene after this incident.

content.summary: Fast moving blue object in the night-time sky
